name: Renea Obryan
text: Great Company to work with. Our service Representative Derek is so nice and helpful, an asset to the Company. Great experience all around from Sales to Service. We love our rugs!!

name: Jr 5 Mcmillian
text: Thomas Truck Lines, Inc. experience over the years with UniFirst and more especially their representative, Danny, that comes by every week to service our office and shop has been as good as it gets.  Danny is an asset to UniFirst in the highest degree.  He is always upbeat and pleasant.  He is professional and is willing to take the time to answer any questions that we might have.  Highly recommend UniFirst and Danny to any one thinking of using a uniform service.

name: Renea Green
text: Williams Paint And Body Shop from Marianna, Fl here! We LOVE Derek Watkins! He is always in a good mood and upbeat. When we have questions or concerns he is on top of it getting it handled, no problem. 10/10 best there is! He is a great asset to UniFirst Uniform Services.

name: Whitewater Environmental
text: Absolutely the best customer service representative (Derek) on our route! He makes sure we have everything we need and communicates all schedule changes in advance. Loves that he brings In the catalogs for opportunities to buy merchandise too.

name: Sharon Lampley
text: I work here , started yesterday. Love It 💕

name: Dajun Godwin
text: My name is Dajun Godwin and I am one of the Route Service Managers here at UniFirst in Dothan, Al. It has been a pleasure to work with this company for the past nine years and I look forward to many more! UniFirst, not only in Dothan, but company wide, is a generous company who not only looks after their customers, but their employees needs and desires. UniFirst is a great company to work for with great benefits and provides so many with the opportunities for growth within the company. I would recommend UniFirst as not just a company that will give you a great job, but a company you can grow in and build a career in!

name: Lillie Gilbert
text: This is Jackson county road and bridge Derek is so awesome I love working with him, he is a super nice guy. I appreciate how he communicate with me about the uniform's. It's always good to see him on Thursday ☺️

name: Cathy Daughtry
text:
Chris is always so helpful and eager to help us anyway he can. Always comes in with a smile.
Thanks for keeping our guys uniform ready.  We appreciate all you do for us,  Chris.    ~Cathy, with ADS Security- Dothan, Al.~

name: Londa Rambeau
text: Mr. Danny always does an AMAZING job! Everyone here at (Georgia Gulf Sulfur) really appreciate his time and effort. Thank you!

name: Myra Johnson
text: Derek Watkins is always very friendly, courteous & helpful. He always helps with whatever we need and always has a smile on his face.  Great customer service representative for your company.

name: Donta Wade
text: Mr. Danny is amazing! Always on time and great customer service! will recommend him and UniFirst to anyone. Signed THE TOWN OF GORDON, ALABAMA.

name: Connie Adams
text: I am an employee of XPO Logistics and Michael Lingo is our route driver.   He is always so helpful, courteous and pleasant.  He always goes about his work with a smile on his face.   He is a wonderful representation of your company and you should be proud to have him as an employee!

name: Quetta Johnson
text: Derek comes to Cobbs and he is a great guy very respectable! Does his job well! Always asking what he can do to help more or make things better!

name: Regina Lacaze
text: Exceeds our expectations! Service is wonderful, friendly and fast! Always goes the extra mile to make sure you are 100% satisfied!

name: BJs Grill
text: This is Jennifer, owner of BJs Grill in Chipley, FL.  We have the most amazing route driver, Derek! He always goes above and beyond to make sure we have everything we need at our restaurant! He is always a pleasure to see each week and takes his time to get to know his customers!! He is a definite asset!! 😁

name: Felicia Bowick
text: My name is Felicia Bowick Manger at a Convenient Store and Michael Lingo work my store and I must say he gives great customer service 😀 I be satisfied every time never skip a beat Keep up the good work  Michael 👍

name: cheryl davidson
text: Derek is knowledgeable and always professional and polite! He is a pleasure to do business with here at Washington County BOCC.

name: Leonard Redmon
text: This Skeeter from Finish Line Automotive, our route guy Derek, is great. He's always thorough and very helpful.

name: Stefanie Drummond
text: I work for Kraton Chemical in Marianna and we have the BEST SERVICE thanks to Derek!!  He's always super friendly and helpful!!

name: Derek Watkins
text: I work here as an RSR and I love working and servicing our customers! Great place to work and great place to get a opportunity to meet new people!

name: Steve Bond
text: I'm Steve" Cowboy" Bond counter team leader at Mayer Electric Supply in Dothan Alabama, We use unifirst mainly because of the friendly service I receive from my route driver Michael Lingo...No one we get service from is as spot on in all categories as Michael. Great asset for unifirst....

name: Anthony Wade
text: This is Aaron at William's Bros trucking and our route guy Derek is awesome! He always fixes any uniforms that needs to be repaired! Friendly as well

name: Wayne Morris
text: I own and operate Morris Auto Parts in Ashford Alabama and have had the privilege of doing business with Mr. Danny Pope for 17 years now. He is always professional and courteous and is an outstanding representative that Unifirst should be proud to have on their team.

name: JACKSON HONDA
text:
UniFirst has been an exceptional company while catering to our needs. Courtney visits weekly and is always such a joy. We all look forward to seeing her.  She presents a professional demeanor while remaining very personable. Prior to Courtney taking over our route, Dajun was our A-1! It is always a great surprise when he subs our route. We could not ask for better customer service than that provided by both Courtney and Dajun! Both are the epitome of excellent customer service.

-Jackson Honda & Used Cars, Andalusia, AL

name: Kim Hutchinson
text: I think I can speak for my entire department at Gulf Coast Truck , when I say we think very highly of Michael Lingo.   Michael is extremely dependable, professional and friendly.   His sunny disposition always puts a smile on our faces, he is such a joy to work with.

name: Carmeshia Walker
text: Great company, great managers, and just all around great place to work.

text: I am the owner of Mia’s Italian Restaurant here in Dothan. Have done business  for 22 years with them. Absolutely love my driver Michael Lingo. He is a great guy and always there when I need him

text: We use Unifirst for our employee uniforms and have been very pleased with their services.  Great staff, especially Xavier!  He is always friendly and is a great representative for the company.

name: Nicole Bradley
text: The Jackson County BOCC has used UniFirst for the last several years. Derek became our driver in 2020 and has been very attentive and helpful to us as a customer with a wide variety of departments and locations as well as a chaotic period of time in which our main building was inaccessible to the public and required him going out of his way to use our back doors and even detours within the building.

name: Beau Gibson
text: We receive A+ product and customer service here at Covington Heavy Duty parts from UniFirst. Lingo is the best route man we could ask for. Highly recommended for businesses locally.

text: We at Early County Public Works have the best service. Chris Lett helps me with any problems I have or any questions about our invoice. Couldn't ask for anyone better. He is always smiling and has a very good attitude.

If you need a uniform service that consistently meets & exceeds your expectations, Unifirst in Dothan is who you call!

text: My company has done business with Unifirst for a while, Chris is always a delight when he comes in on our route! That’s always a plus!

name: R ll
text: This is the best place I have ever worked. I enjoy my job and the people I work with.

name: Pat Zorn
text:
We have been with Unifirst for 10 years and we have always had GREAT service. Jamey, our delivery driver, is outstanding...True Professional.
Samson Steel Truss.

name: Jim Ed Brown
text: I'm employed with Covington Cleaner & Equipment (DIVISION OF CHDP) in Andalusia, Al. We've only been open since Oct 2015. Once we first started getting our uniforms from UniFirst, I have to say, I have ZERO complaints with our service. We've had several changes that we asked in our initial fitting, from the pants size, to the shirts, and the style each person felt comfortable in. And each time a request was made, the next delivery (each week), our request was fulfilled, and with a smile on top of that.  If there's a business out there that has been searching for a great  uniform service, then look no further. THIS IS IT!!!

name: Antonio Caceres
text: jamie, our delivery guy here to our MAACO of Dothan location is by far, one of the most professional, hard working and honest individuals i have come across in the rental uniform field. Always on time, courteous and polite to all of our needs in the front office with our mats and our uniforms. Wished we had 4 of him working for us here!

name: Bonnie HCG
text: I am with the Henry Co Gin and Dajun is our UniFirst rep and he does an excellent job.  He is always cheerful and willing to hear any problems or concerns we may have, which is usually none or very small, and handles them immediately.   The workers know they can ask him questions about purchasing pants, shirts or jackets for themselves and he is very helpful in answering all their questions.  We are extremely pleased with the service we receive from UniFirst and Dajun.

name: Spenser Peters
text:
I own Spensers meat market in Dothan
Unifirst has provided me with great product and wonderful customer service over the years!
The drivers are very pleasant to deal with also!
I'd highly recommend them to anyone looking for services!

name: Jamie Croft
text: I work with Opp's Co-op in Opp, AL.  UniFirst of Dothan, AL provides us with great service.  Dejun is the best! He always makes sure we are pleased with the service and does what ever he can for us. Highly recommend UniFirst of Dothan!

name: Christi Peterson
text:
I am the owner of Ray's Restaurant. I would like to say that our delivery driver, Jamie is the best! And for him I give him 5 stars. He always makes sure that we have what we need and goes above and beyond to make sure that we get it. Thanks Jamie!

The reason that I am giving Uni1st an overall 3  stars is because we often have problems withour towels being full of lint. They also come torn or very worn also. We sometimes do not get a full bag, shorting us before our next delivery.  Our aprons that we receive often have half of the tie torn off. So we can't even tie them on. Also, they come very stained occasionally as if they have been mildewed and then laundered. The mildew stain is still there after the wash. We pay a fee each week for these items to be replaced as needed, but we rarely see new items in the
mix. We have also had problems with the posting of payments in a timely manner. Because the payments are not posted we then get a late charge added to the bill. It would be great if these small issues could get taken care of.

name: Tiffany Blackmon
text: The Dothan Housing Authority -Henry Green Central Office really enjoys the service that we receive from Uni First our delivery man: "Dajun" is very courteous, reliable, and efficient. GREAT JOB !!!

name: Alex Ethridge
text:
We are so pleased with our service from UniFirst here at Keystone Automotive! Having a clean environment is important to us when running a business and UniFirst gives us the resources to do so. Our friendly driver, Dajun Godwin, always shows up with our clean floor mats and soap with a smile on his face! He does everything for us! We couldn't be happier with this company!

Alex Ethridge
Dothan, Al.
Accountant

name: Daniel Draughon
text: Unifirst is our uniform provider at Tri - State Commercial Tire in Dothan, Alabama and our representative is Jamey Watkins. We could not be happier with the service we receive from them. Jamey is always on time and has a great attitude!

name: Amber Carpenter
text: I am Amber Carpenter with Jackson Honda and I recommend UniFirst out of Dothan AL to any company who is in the market for uniforms they provide great service. Great customer service!!!!

text: Hi i'm Chris with Maaco Collision Repair and Auto Painting.  I have used Unifirst for several years now. Michael our driver has great attitude and great personallity.  He always has a smile on his face and is always on time.  Couldn't ask for a better person.

name: Debbie Rawls
text: I am employed with Covington Casket Co in Andalusia, AL and Dajun is our service guy and I would like to rate him as a 5 star service man, he is and has always serviced Covington Casket with great service and much respect.

name: john banks
text: Arnold's Automotive says UniFirst is a great company with great customer service!

name: Judy Perdue
text:
I have had Unifirst for five years and they are a great company to do business with!  They have worked with me to help me stay within my budget and they give me great service.  I have a regular representative, Dajon Godwin, but all of the subs and management are great guys.  They are always up with a smile, and they make me feel like they appreciate my business.  I would recommend Unifirst Uniform Company to anyone looking to rent uniforms and other items.

Sincerely,
Judy Perdue, Property Manager
Colony Square Apts.
Dothan, AL. 36301

text: Pretty good selection of work boots. The only somewhat negative was we needed a certain size that wasn't on the shelf. The person went in the back and then came back and said that the truck driver took the key to the trucks home.  So she couldn't go look on the truck for the size we needed. We had to settle for a different choice.

I've got to admit; as I entered the plaza and several shops closed my aspersions slipped but!!! Without-a-doubt???? One of the best selections of NameBrand and Also Mid-Range Work boots and... Other shoes too of course But I was focused entirely on work boots!
The staff treated me with More patients than "I" probably could have??!! Lol
Very pleasant experience and wearing my boots (6) hours the latter( Yep! Wore those suckers home! :-), and lovein' - thus far!!

name: Chris Bunnell
text: First time there. Sign and their website said they open at 10am on Tuesday. Well I left at 10:15 when they were still closed.

resp.text: Chris, i am so sorry we missed you this morning. This is Not how we normally operate at all, for personal reasons I was late this morning and arrived at the store as soon as I could and opened at 10:30. This should Not happen again. I would like to extend a free $10 credit to you if you would like to give us another try. I hope you will.

name: Stephanie Guinn
text: They Make U Go Through 3 Interviews Just To Tell U Didnt Make It . I Would Definitely Not Work Here.

name: Brandon Powell
text: Hands down, great place to work!

name: Stephen McGatha
text: They service the place I work for. I never have clean uniforms available. This is the third time in two years I've been without uniforms.

name: Riggins Tallow
text: Our company closed  this year and we closed the account with Cintas.  We were with them for over 20 years and they said we had a bunch of missing uniforms which we had asked months before to look into.  The service manager (very rude) forgot to look into this and then charged us for $1200 in missing uniforms.  Its funny how I always asked their delivery guy to let me know if anything is missing. They always said we were good. Then when we canceled the contract boom there's missing uniforms.  I would steer clear of this company.

name: Ronald White
text: The delivery date was changed from Tuesday to Monday at our plant and every since that day, our uniforms have not been delivered on time. Seems like if you want to run a good business, you would try to improve this at some point. This has been going on since the scheduled pick up day was changed. This past week, they did not even show up at all.

name: Grace Abston
text: I had applied to cintas awhile back. I went threw 3 interviews and a work day preview. It has been months now and I still have not been paid for the work day preview as promised. Every time I have gone to talk to them they have given me the run around just like they did when they were suppose to let me know whether or not I got the job with them. I from personal experience do not recommend this company in any way form or fashion. Especially since they have no issues breaking labor laws.

name: Renee marshall Greer
text: They Supply uniforms and do all maintenance and cleaning for them always courteous and friendly willing to help you be able to complete your jobs whatever they may be that requires a uniform

name: Michael Ford
text: Great place. In shipping, Erin, is a very nice man.

name: Donald Lisle
text: Very Poor job of getting the clothes clean. Every week, same oil spotted dirty clothes.  We even did a test & washed them ourselves with just Cheer & Spray&Wash on the oil spots.  98% of the oil spots & dirt came out & they look great again..  Next week, same  lousy job cleaning them from them. Complaints fall on deaf ears.

name: Shenae M
text: Truly.... just hoping they are ...all they have me to believe they are

name: Brandon Stone
text: Horrible service. I can't begin to tell you the problems we have had with this company.  first of all their cleaning products made a few of our clients super sick and they keep telling us that their chemicals are safe.  Secondly after we got rid of the chemicals they said that one of our checks did not go through even after providing them proof that the check did indeed go through. Do not use this company. We will be contacting our lawyer

name: Amy Maddox
text: We ended up with another companies delivery mixed in with our order. We did not receive everything I ordered either. We are very disappointed and feel the company needs to get it together because this happens on the regular at many businesses.

name: Brock Beiersdoerfer
text: After 5 years using this company at our local shop, we shopped around because prices continued to increase.  We decided to move and were sent letters by their attorney threatening lawsuit for the remaining 14 months of our agreement.  Within their rights to do that?  Of course.  But a terrible way of doing business and treating clients, especially to a customer of 5 years.  If we are not happy with the new company, we will never go back to Cintas and will warn other business owners as well.

name: Fire Maker
text: This service is a JOKE!!! 6 weeks no uniforms but they didn’t miss the payroll deduction. Piss poor customer service. Talked to the delivery guy promised they would be on the truck next week. It’s been two weeks.  Canceling service and expect a full refund! They act like you owe them, you are the PAYING CUSTOMER! They WORK FOR YOU!!

name: Jane Doe
text: I've had a good experience with the company for years.

name: Braiden Brown
text: Cool for kids but boring for adults

name: Evangelist Robert Roberts evangelistrr
text: Great Company to work for

name: Bobby Flurry
text: Love these clothes! They last a very long time.  Seriously,  I have shirts that are 15 years old that I still wear. They look relatively new. I also love the NEXT plan. The extra off is usually a surprise and makes me happy! The staff is always friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing what an awesome experience you had with the team at the Bel Air Mall EXPRESS. We forwarded your feedback to the District Manager so that they know what a special time you all had in the store. If you should have any additional questions, feel free to reach us at 1-888-397-1980.

name: A1aerials Droner
text: Great place for competitive paying jobs.

name: Dani Cakes
text:
My son, who is kind of shy, had a school dance coming up so we were in need of a suit. We didn’t know where to start and neither my son nor I had any confidence in what to even look at.
When we walked in, Malcolm headed straight for us and instantly took us under his wing. He patiently spent close to an hour helping my son find the right fit, the right color (for his skin tone) and to match his date’s dress. We found everything we needed except for the tie. We were so very pleased with the purchase we made. But the most important thing we left with, was my son’s confidence! Malcolm told my son “to stand up straight, lift your head up, and be confident in the good looking guy that he is”
As a mom, to a shy teenage boy,  this means the world to me!
When we left to go find the tie at a different store, we were totally lost again. My son said “mom, do you think we can go get Malcolm to help us?” They may not ever see each other again but this guy with the exceptional customer service skills made a LIFELONG impact on my son. Express, I hope you realize how great of an employee you have in Malcolm. I wish the world was filled with more Malcolms.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing what an awesome experience you had with the team at the Bel Air Mall EXPRESS. We forwarded your feedback to the District Manager so that they know what a special time you all had in the store. If you should have any additional questions, feel free to reach us at 1-888-397-1980.

name: josie
text: no one greeted me or smiled or anything and one shirt is like 89 dollars I got scared and left

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us. Your comments have been shared with the District Manager. If there is anything else that we can do for you, please feel free to call us at 1-888-397-1980 and select option 3 or email us at talk@express.com.

name: Nicole Duncan
text: Express always have what I'm looking for and more .

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to contact EXPRESS about your positive experience at our Mobile location. We are so happy that you had such a great time shopping and hope to see you back real soon.

name: Kelsea Eskew
text: This is by far the worst Express I have been to. I was the only customer in the store and not one employee asked if I needed anything. When I needed to try a top on, again no help but they did walk by me when I was standing in the dressing room doorway and one lady walked into the office that was in the back, right next to the door way where I was standing.  This is not the place I want to give my money too.

resp.text: We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us. Your comments have been shared with the District Manager. If there is anything else that we can do for you, please feel free to call us at 1-888-397-1980 and select option 3 or email us at talk@express.com.

name: Alena Tarasevich
text: They have nice clothes that's not affordable to an average college student. I mean prices down south are the exact same prices they have up north (I visited express in Washington State). The only difference is the minimum wage there $15.00

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out and sharing your feedback with us! We'll make sure we pass that along to the appropriate department.

name: Angenette Peterson
text: Love this store. The employees are professional, helpful and friendly. They know me by name. Lol. I found a dress to where to my son's graduration and a concert. My sons love the jackets and jeans i buy here or order on line.

text: Never enough employees staffed anymore. Have to wait and wait for a dressing room when only one other customer in store because only one employee. Poor management.

name: Janice Catoe

name: Lucy Hodnett
text: TWTB never lets me down. Perfect fit!  Always in style.  Fast shipping. Great prices. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Tangileah Rogers
text: They are always so nice and will help with anything!

name: Cameron Callis
text: I absolutely love The Willow Tree! They have the kindest and most outgoing staff, and they always make everyone feel so welcomed each shopping visit. They have an amazing selection of clothing, shoes, and accessories, and they are always getting in new items. If your size is not available, they always will call the other Willow Tree locations and try and locate your size. They always provide such wonderful customer service, which is one reason I keep going back in to shop. Thank you Willow Tree ladies! -Cam

name: Jennifer Villalvazo
text: The only place in town to get TYLER fragrances.. candles, wax, sprays and laundry detergent.
